data.actual_result: User can override granting them the ability to delete channels System Settings: Android 6.0 System settings: Android 6.0 Client version: 3.1.8
data.expected_result: User has permissions given to them and cannot override
data.short_description: User can give themselves manage channel permissions by having manage roles
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a user with manage roles - Have the user open the manage channel permissions on android - Tap permissions - add user/role permissions to channel
